Mimi Chakraborty Wiki | Biography | Salary | Movie | Age | Boyfriend

Bolly Reporter
7 months ago

Mimi Chakraborty is a very popular Bengali Film, Television Actress and politician. She participated in Femina Miss India. Her acting debut was with Bapi Bari Jaa. She was listed as the most desirable woman in the Calcutta Times list of Most Desirable Women 2016. Mimi Chakraborty is a Member of Lok Sabha from Jadavpur Constituency of West Bengal in the 17th Lok Sabha (2019-2024).

Biography & Wiki

Mimi Chakraborty’s nickname is Mimi. She was born on 11 February 1989 in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 30 years. Mimi’s Zodiac is Aquarius. She spent her childhood in Arunachal Pradesh in Deomali, a town in Tirap district, but later moved back to her ancestral home in Jalpaiguri City. Later she came to Kolkata and now her Hometown in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. She is from a Bengali Brahmin family.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Mimi’s height in feet is 5’ 4”. Also, her height in Centimeters is 163 cm.

Family Members

Mimi is the daughter of Arun Chakraborty. Her mother’s name is Tapashi Chakraborty.

BrotherNot Known
SisterNot Known
Best FriendsNusrat Jahan

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Mimi had a serious relationship with Director & Producer Raj Chakrabarty. It was rumored that the relationship was broken because of Melih Kizilkaya. Now she is having a relationship with Melih Kizilkaya, who lives in Turkey. He is the son of local line producer Ilhan Kzlky, who manages all of Tollywood’s directors and actors when there is a shooting in Turkey.

Education and School, College

Mimi completed her schooling at Holy Child School, Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India. After that, she completed higher education from St. James’ School, Binnaguri, West Bengal, India. Moreover, She completed her bachelor degree in English from Asutosh College, Kolkata, India

Salary and Net Worth

Mimi has an estimated net worth of Rs 2.43 crore as of 2019. Furthermore, She has Rs 25,000 cash in hand, bank deposits of Rs 71.89 lakh, investments in mutual funds with a total current market value of about Rs 50,000. Mimi possesses 271.4 grams of jewelry, bullion or valuables, of which 100 grams valued at Rs 3.26 lakh was inherited and 171.4 grams worth Rs 5.59 lakh was self-purchased, besides two cars. She owns a flat in Kolkata

Mimi asks for Rs.30 Lakh per movie as Salary.

Mimi Chakraborty Filmography

Mimi Chakraborty in Femina Miss India. Her acting debut was with Champion. She was made her debut in Bengali Movie Bapi Bari Jaa on 7 December 2012 as Dola. Also, She worked in TV serial Gaaner Oparey, produced by Ideas Creations. It aired on Star Jalsha from 28 June 2010 to 16 April 2011.

Mimi has been a part of Fame Fashion and Creative Excellence (FFACE) in different ways. In 2014, she unveiled the Edition 1 of the FFACE Calendar at Tantra, Park Hotel Kolkata. In fact, She won several awards like “Star Jalsha Parivar Awards” for the movie “Ki Kore Toke Bolbo”, “71st Annual BFJA Awards” for “Bapi Bari Ja” as Best Promising Actress.

Politics

West Bengal Chief Minister and president of Trinamool Congress party Mamata Banerjee announced Mimi as a candidate for the Lok Sabha election 2019. Finally, Mimi won an election from Jadavpur Constituency. She won by a margin of 56 thousand votes.

Awards & Recognition

Mimi received Several Awards & Nominations her acting performance.

  • She won Telesomman Awards for Gaaner Oparey in Telekonya Category.
  • In 2013 she Grabs the “Big Bangla Rising Star Awards” for “Bapi Bari Ja”.
  • She received “Star Jalsha Parivar Awards” for “Best Romantic Jodi with Ankush Hazra” for her movie Ki Kore Toke Bolbo.

Facts about Mimi Chakraborty

  • Mimi is the best friend of Nusrat.
  • Mimi and Nusrat trolled for wearing Shirt-trousers, jeans in Parliament House.
  • In 2014, she was a part of the conceptual gift cards of FFACE and she appeared as Goddess Durga on the cards for promoting women empowerment.
  • She has a Tatoo of ‘Nataraj (lord of dance)’ on her right forearm.
  • She is an animal lover and she is having two dogs in her house, named Chickoo & Max.
